attributes.action: Politician promises/votes to be made accountable to prevent the loss of voting
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May - We are leaving the EU on March 29

Brett promises vs Reality - 
https://www.theguardian.com/politics/ng-interactive/2018/mar/28/11-brexit-promises-leavers-quietly-dropped

Promise: We will not increase VAT, Income Tax or National Insurance Contributions.

The list goes on.....

I SUGGEST THAT POLITICIANS ARE HELD ACCOUNTABLE FOR NOT MEETING PROMISES WITHOUT GOOD REASON. AN INDEPENDENT BODY TO MONITOR AND REMOVE OFFENDERS FROM POSITION.

Lets restore faith,

Stephen Willoughby
attributes.background:
It's fair to say that recent political activity have left a majority of the UK's electorate feel undermined and betrayed.

So much so that many are feeling it's now pointless to Vote. People have died for us to be able to Vote and confidence has to be restored.
